snippet: Now that Moriah Galleries, one of Manhattan’s oldest purveyors of Jewish ritual objects and art, has closed, Menorah Galleries has bought its inventory.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Menorah Galleries features preview of Jewish ritual objects and art purchased from Moriah Galleries, which closed its doors after six decades; Jewish antiques will be on display in three basement rooms at Manhattan Art & Antiques Center.
lead_paragraph: Now that Moriah Galleries, one of Manhattan’s oldest purveyors of Jewish ritual objects and art, has closed, Menorah Galleries has bought its inventory.

headline.print_headline: Jewish Ritual Objects and Their StoriesFind a New Home
headline.main: Showcasing Jewish Antiques and Their Stories
